mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM r , s.* FROM ( SELECT m.email , m.FULLNAME, m.BIRTHDAY, m.PERSONALURI, p.PROFILECODE FROM members m JOIN friendship f ON m.email = f.friendemail left OUTER JOIN profiles p ON p.email =f.friendemail WHERE f.email=#{param1} ORDER BY email asc ) s )WHERE r BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Friendship WHERE (Email = #{param1} AND FriendEmail = #{param2}) OR (Email = #{param2} AND FriendEmail = #{param1})
